data.name: Tool_InfoSelectLineStartPoint
data.value: Select a point to create or delete a line

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_2
data.value: - Fillers. Space between lines can be filled in to indicate the areas prohibited for stopping or driving. 3 styles are available: Lines, Grid and Solid Fill. To create hold Alt. - Stop lines. It is now possible to connect two points on the same road to create a stop line. 2 available styles: "Solid" and "Dashed". - New line style: "Solid & Dashed". - Lines and templates in the list now have icons that show style and colour. - Markings will be now copied when the road is copied with MoveIt (function will not become available until MoveIt mod is updated). - Added Copy and Paste options for line colour. - Upgrading the road to a different road with the same amount of lanes will now preserve the markings. - Line segment with the rule will be highlighted when hovering over the edit panel of that rule. - Added Simplified Chinese translation.

data.name: Tool_InfoDeleteStopLine
data.value: Click to delete the stop line

data.name: Tool_InfoCreateStopLine
data.value: Click to create a stop line

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerClickStart
data.value: Click to start creating a filler

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerClickEnd
data.value: Click to finish creating the filler

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerClickNext
data.value: Click to select the next point in the contour

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerSelectStart
data.value: Select a point to start creating a filler

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerSelectNext
data.value: Select the next point in the contour

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_2_1
data.value: - Fix hold Alt, Ctrl and Shift buttons on Mac OS and Linux. - Added "Double solid" and "Double Dashed" stop line styles. - Added Italian and Portuguese translations.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_1
data.value: - "What`s New" message this will pop-up one time after an update and can be disabled in the Options menu. - Added the following translations: Czech, Dutch, French, German, Japanese, Polish, Russian, and Spanish (Please contact the mod author to assist with translation into your own language). - End Points can now be dragged from one to another by holding Ctrl. - Backups - In the Options menu the marking data on a map can now be backed up by dumping to a file and then importing it. This is necessary if you need to disable the mod, make a new save without the mod, and then need to recovery all markings. - There will now be a popup warning when deleting items. This applies to lines, rules and templates. This can be disabled in the options. - New shortcut added for adding a new rule - Shift+Ctrl+A (remappable). - Quick Rule setup: After adding a new rule the interface for selecting its start and end points now opens automatically. You no longer need to click the "From" and "To" areas. This can be disabled in the options. - Fixed issue with lines appearing to be broken or split - only occurred at highway and city road transitions. - Lines will no longer render when Info View overlays are shown. - Activation shortcut will now trigger when another tool opens while Marking Tool is already opened.

data.name: LineEditor_EmptyMessage
data.value: There are no lines at this intersection yet. To create a line connect two points.

data.name: FillerEditor_EmptyMessage
data.value: There are no fillers at this intersection yet. To create a filler hold {0} or press {1}.

data.name: TemplateEditor_EmptyMessage
data.value: The list of templates is empty. To create a template, click «{0}» at the line or crosswalk or filler style.

data.name: EarlyAccess_FunctionUnavailableMessage
data.value: Function «{0}» is currently only available for Patreons early access. It will be available to everyone later. By registering early access, you will support the ability to develop this mod at the same speed.

data.name: EarlyAccess_ThanksMessage
data.value: Thank you for your support, now you can enjoy all the features.

data.value: Click to create a perpendicular line

data.name: Tool_InfoDeleteNormalLine
data.value: Click to delete the perpendicular line

data.name: CrosswalkEditor_EmptyMessage
data.value: There are no crosswalks at this intersection yet. To create a crosswalk hold {0}.

data.name: LineEditor_RuleOverlappedWarning
data.value: This rule is overlapped by another rule. Check the other rule's "From" and "To" points.

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectCrosswalkStartPoint
data.value: Select a point to create or delete a crosswalk

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_3
data.value: - Added new filler style - Chevron (<<<<<). - Added crosswalks. Hold Shift to create them. Currently available Styles: "Existing crosswalk", "Zebra", "Double Zebra", "Parallel solid lines", "Parallel dashed lines", "Ladder", "Solid". - Added perpendicular lines. These lines don't have second point, they are generated as a straight line from one point. To create perpendicular line, pull the line in the opposite direction from the intersection. - Added the ability to copy/paste style of lines, fillers, and crosswalks. - Added ability to sort lines and templates by styles and types. You can modify and disable the function in the settings. - Updated template selection menu. - Added grouping of nearby points for easier selection. There are two types of grouping available: in a circle and in a line. You can pick the type or disable the function in the settings. - Added indication of conflicting rules. - Added the ability to center a solid line in the "Solid & Dashed" style. - Changed how to begin editing a point. Now you need to click on the point while holding Ctrl. - Added the ability to select tool's language different from the game language. - Added Finnish language.

data.name: Mod_LoadFailed

data.name: Tool_InfoStartDragPointMode

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_4
data.value:
WARNING: Default templates setting will be reset.
- Added the ability to copy/paste marking from one exist intersection to another exist intersection. - Now the marking is not removed if you replace the road with a different number of points. - Added map editor support. - Added the ability to save marking data in intersection assets. - Added "Shark teeth" line and stop line style. - Added "Solid&Dashed" stop line style. - Added "Chess board" crosswalk style. - Added the ability to set create modifiers for any styles. - Added the ability to duplicate templates. - Added the ability to have several templates with some name. - Added Alignment option to all double line styles. - Added the ability to start filler "Chevron" style from edges. - Added the ability to get delete warning only if will affect others items. - Added the ability to resize panel. - Added the ability to backup templates. - Added the ability to reset all points offset. - Added MoveIt mirroring support (wait MoveIt update). - Update filler "Chevron" style calculation algorithm. - Fix filler vertex duplicates in create interface. - Fix asym lines wrong invert value after load.

data.name: Settings_RailUnderMarkingWarning
data.value: Warning: this option changes game objects render order

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_4_1
data.value: - Added the ability to draw marking under tracks. This can be disabled in the options. WARNING: This option change game objects render order. - Added modifier to create a empty line (without rules). - Added the ability to create all edge lines at once (line from road last point to next road first point). - Lines no longer climb on pavement. Work only for lines from the first or last road point. - Added "Quick crosswalk option setup" - automatically open border selection interface after create crosswalk like line's "Quick rule setup". This can be disabled in the options. - Added panel additional options menu. - Fix left mouse click on selection node. - Fix panel out of screen. - Hover overlay color changed from white to light blue to avoid merging with the markup. - Crosswalk line no longer creates unnecessary intersections. You may need to set crosswalk borders for already created crosswalks.

data.name: PresetEditor_EmptyMessage
data.value: The list of presets is empty. To create a preset, click «{0}» at the panel header.

data.name: Tool_EndApplyPresetOrderMessage
data.value: Do you want to apply a preset?

data.value: Do you really want to restore presets? The restored presets will replace all existing presets.

data.value: To change its name requires rewriting the asset file. Continue?

data.name: TemplateEditor_RewriteMessage
data.value: To change its name and values requires rewriting the asset file. Continue?

data.name: CrosswalkEditor_BordersWarning
data.value: To be able to set the crosswalk borders, you must have lines started from the same points as the crosswalk

data.name: LineEditor_RulesWarning
data.value: You must have lines that intersect with this line to be able to change the rule's "From" and "To" points and create additional rules.

data.name: PresetEditor_SaveChangesMessage
data.value: Do you want to save preset name change?

data.name: TemplateEditor_SaveChangesMessage
data.value: Do you want to save template values changes?

data.name: PresetEditor_NameExistMessage
data.value: The name "{0}" is already used by another preset. Are you sure you want to have multiple presets with the same name?

data.name: PresetEditor_IsAssetWarningMessage
data.value: It can only be deleted from the game content manager.

data.name: PresetEditor_IsWorkshopWarningMessage
data.value: This preset can't be modified. It can only be deleted from the game content manager or unsubscribed from on the Steam Workshop.

data.name: TemplateEditor_IsAssetWarningMessage
data.value: It can only be deleted from the game content manager.

data.name: TemplateEditor_IsWorkshopWarningMessage
data.value: This template can't be modified. It can only be deleted from the game content manager or unsubscribed from on the Steam Workshop.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5
data.value: - Added the ability to save whole intersection marking as preset and after apply to any other intersection. - Added the ability to save templates and presets as asset and share it over Workshop. - Updated UI and improved UI performance. Reduced delay when switching tabs and selecting items. - Now templates values can be changes only in edit mode, what prevents accidental changes to values. - Added panel tips (can be disable in settings). - Added the ability to cut new line by crosswalks (can be disable in settings). - Added the ability to change color values with mouse wheel. - Fix train and monorail roads (and any else without points). - Fix and improve points group overlay. - Added English-UK translation.

data.name: LineEditor_NotSupportRules
data.value: This line type doesn't support rules

data.name: Settings_DontCutBorderByCrosswalk
data.value: Don't cut line by crosswalk if it is their border

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5_1
data.value: - Improve messages about load data errors. - Fix and update localizes.

data.name: Mod_LoadFailedAll
data.value: Load was completed with errors. Failed to load markings for all intersections.

data.name: FillerEditor_InfoSelectRailFirst
data.value: Select a guide's first point or line as guide

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5_2
data.value: - Update Harmony dependence: resolving conflicts with others mods that use it

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5_3
data.value: - Fixed a situation where markings could disappear from saving

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_6
data.value: - Added the ability to make markings on segments. - Added filler 3D styles: "Pavement" and "Grass". - Added line 3D style: "Pavement". - Added the ability follow rails to filler styles "Stripes" and "Chevron". - Improve performance by added LOD (Level Of Detail) to markings. The LOD distance is set in the settings. - Added support taxiways. - Fixed a conflict with other mods that could cause the tool button to not appear. - Fixed a conflict with scroll panel and scroll wheel to change values. - Now there is no difference that you enter a dot or a comma in the properties value field.

data.name: MessageBox_ItWillReplace
data.value: It will replace the existing markings.

data.name: Tool_ApplyBetweenIntersectionsMessage
data.value: Do you really want to apply marking between intersections?

data.name: Tool_ApplyWholeStreetMessage
data.value: Do you really want to apply marking to whole "{0}"?

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectLineEndPointNormal
data.value: Drag behind point for perpendicular line

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectLineEndPointStop
data.value: Select endpoint for regular or stop line

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7
data.value: - New node/segment selection mode. The selection area exactly follows the actual shapes of the nodes and segments that prevents difficulties with selecting too close together nodes. - Added automatic line creation when create filler. No more need add lines before create filler. - Added the ability to split point to two virtual points, set split shift and choose lines alignment. Now possible continue one double line with two separating single lines. - Added style modifier "From clipboard". Hold Ctrl+Alt to apply style from clipboard to new line, rule, crosswalk or filler. - Added the ability to apply segment marking between two intersections and apply to whole street. - Added the ability set second color for "Zebra" and "Double zebra" crosswalk styles. - Changed press escape key behavior. Now it's like default game tool behavior. If something is being edited, then press escape will suggest an exit, rather than closing the tool with the loss of changes. - Added point grouping by road in list (can be disable in settings). - Fix line connector overlay position on elevated roads. - Fix 3D filler styles calculation. - Fix error in copy/paste marking mode that made it impossible to use the tool. - Fix reset panel scroll position when resize panel. - Crosswalk mode no more activate by hold shift when change value by scroll wheel. - Set panel default size by double click on panel resizer.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_1
data.value: - Added the ability to set alignment for stop lines. - Additional templates sort: 1 - Default templates sorted by type 2 - Other templates sorted by type then by name 3 - Other author templates sort by author name then by type then by name - Fix load segment presets. - Fix default panel size.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_2
data.value: - Fix 3D fillers height outside available tiles. - Fix creating button duplicates.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_3
data.value: - Added missing dependencies checker. - Fix 3D fillers height on nodes outside available tiles.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_4
data.value: - Fixed save and load presets' screenshot. - Fixed bug when nodes with marking after loading had a wrong shape. - Added Indonesian translation.

data.name: Settings_HideStreetName
data.value: Hide street names while using tool

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectCrosswalk
data.value: Click with {0} to select the crosswalk

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectLine
data.value: Click with {0} to select the line

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_8
data.value: - Added selection step over like in MoveIt. Press Ctrl+Space to step over (you can rebind in mod options). - Added curbs to filler 3D styles. - Added rounded corners to filler 3D styles. - Added offset from lines to filler 3D styles. - Added filler styles: Gravel, Ruined, Cliff. - Added pavement stop line style. - Added option "Follow guide lines" for solid filler, so now possible make solid fillers on sloped segments. - Added the ability to click with Ctrl to select line or crosswalk instend of delete its. - Added warning for Linux users about missing libraries. - Added the ability to change style by scroll wheel. - Added the ability to hide street names while using tool. Can be disabled in mod options. - Added new icon for UUI button. - Fixed select template button icon.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_8_1
data.value: - Buttons in paste mode moved ouside of circle. - Added Korean translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_8_2
data.value: - Added discard button after create template/preset. - Added colored text to tooltips. - Added the ability to hide original mod button in toolbar If you use UUI mod. - Fixed not removed items from list when this items were removed. - Fixed line grouping. - Added Turkish translation.

data.name: Settings_SortPresetByRoadCount
data.value: By road count, then by names

data.name: Settings_SortTemplateByAuthor
data.value: By author, then by type, then by name

data.name: Settings_SortApplyByAuthor
data.value: By author, then by type, then by name

data.name: Settings_SortApplyDefaultFirst
data.value: Show default templates at top of apply list

data.name: Settings_IlluminationAtNight
data.value: Illumination of editing marking at night
